description.raw:
When doing a World Reset using Ctrl+R, we noticed that sometimes the Rotate mode is accidentally triggered. This is because we tend to release the Ctrl key before R causing the keyRelease event handler to process the key with no modifier key.

PR changes the event handling of RTS keys to the `keyPress` event.

More of a usability improvement than a bug fix.

jenkins:

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/414/testReport/) - ok
